text:
Union Minister of Railways Suresh Prabhu (centre) launching various projects in Chennai on Sunday. State Minister for Animal Husbandry T.K.M. Chinnayya (left) and DMK MP Tiruchi Siva are present. — Photo: B. Jothi Ramalingam

Tamil Nadu has not got its due share in railway projects over the years resulting in backlog of development and the Centre was committed to correct it, Union Minister of Railways Suresh Prabhu said on Sunday. Page 6
title: TN has not got its due share of development: Railway Minister
